sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( MTCD_CORP_CODE ,MTCD_METH_GUBN ,MTCD_COME_CODE ,MTCD_METH_NAME ,MTCD_INDS_CODE ,MTCD_MATL_CLAS ,MTCD_SORT_KEY0 ,MTCD_UPDT_DATE ,MTCD_UPDT_CMAN ,MTCD_INIT_DATE ,MTCD_INIT_CMAN ,MTCD_DOCU_NUMB ) AS ( SELECT 'K1','A','ANOD','ANODIZING','CO','CO', 3,'20151207','ADMIN' ,'20151207','ADMIN' ,'TRANSYS-G-CO-02' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1','A','ALCT','AL 중력주조 ','AT','AT', 2,'20200101','ADMIN' ,'20200101','ADMIN' ,NULL FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.MTCD_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN A.MTCD_UPDT_DATE = '00000000' THEN 'D' WHEN B.MTCD_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBMTCD B ON B.MTCD_CORP_CODE = A.MTCD_CORP_CODE AND B.MTCD_METH_GUBN = A.MTCD_METH_GUBN AND B.MTCD_COME_CODE = A.MTCD_COME_CODE
